original_text: And the magicians could not stand before Moses because of the boils; for the boil was upon the magicians, and upon all the Egyptians.
korean_text: 요술사들도 악성 종기로 말미암아 모세 앞에 서지 못하니 악성 종기가 요술사들로부터 애굽 모든 사람에게 생겼음이라

sentences.original_text: And the magicians could not stand before Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마술사들은 모세 앞에 설 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: for the boil was upon the magicians
